item.title: EmbyStat Deprecation Notice
item.description: Due to upstream project no longer being actively developed per this update, we have decided to deprecate our EmbyStat container.
item.content: Due to upstream project no longer being actively developed per this update, we have decided to deprecate our EmbyStat container.

item.title: New Container: Embystat
item.description: We have released a new container for Embystat! Embystat is a personal web server that can calculate all kinds of statistics from your (local) Emby server. Just install this on your server and let him calculate all kinds of fun stuff.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Embystat!

Embystat is a personal web server that can calculate all kinds of statistics from your (local) Emby server. Just install this on your server and let him calculate all kinds of fun stuff.
